tasks.label: Original Data: API Health
args: try { Invoke-RestMethod -Uri 'http://127.0.0.1:8093/health' -TimeoutSec 2 | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 5 | Write-Output } catch { Write-Host 'API offline' -ForegroundColor Red; exit 1 }

tasks.label: Original Data: Open Index (MD)
args: if (Test-Path '${workspaceFolder}/outputs/original_data_index.md') { code ${workspaceFolder}/outputs/original_data_index.md } else { Write-Host 'No original_data_index.md found. Build index first.' -ForegroundColor Yellow }

tasks.label: ?㎚ Life: Open Latest Report
args: if (Test-Path '${workspaceFolder}/outputs/life_continuity_latest.json') { code ${workspaceFolder}/outputs/life_continuity_latest.json } else { Write-Host 'No life continuity report found. Run: Life: Check + Save Report' -ForegroundColor Yellow }

tasks.label: Auto: Bring-up on VS Code Open (safe)
YouTube (8092): Start Task Queue Server
args: cd ${workspaceFolder}/LLM_Unified/ion-mentoring; if (Test-Path ./.venv/Scripts/python.exe) { & ./.venv/Scripts/python.exe task_queue_server.py --port 8092 } else { python task_queue_server.py --port 8092 }

tasks.label: YouTube: Open Latest Analysis (MD)
args: $latest = (Get-ChildItem -Path '${workspaceFolder}/outputs/youtube_learner' -Filter '*.md' -File | Sort-Object LastWriteTime -Descending | Select-Object -First 1).FullName; if ($latest) { Start-Process code $latest } else { Write-Host 'No MD found' -ForegroundColor Yellow }

tasks.label: YouTube: Open Index
args: if (Test-Path '${workspaceFolder}/outputs/youtube_learner_index.md') { code ${workspaceFolder}/outputs/youtube_learner_index.md } else { Write-Host 'Index not found. Run: YouTube: Build Index (open)' -ForegroundColor Yellow }

tasks.label: Monitoring: Generate Report (7 days) + Open JSON

Python: Run Vertex AI Test (repo venv)
Load Testing: Summarize Locust Results (All CSVs)
Quick: POST compare personalized vs legacy chat
args: {"message":"Explain AI concepts in a concise style"}

args: {"user_id":"test-123","query":"Explain AI concepts in a concise style"}

tasks.label: Operations: Cleanup Old Logs (7 days, DryRun)
Operations: Cleanup Old Logs (7 days, Execute)
?占쏙옙 AGI: Resume Phase 1 (Execute Test)
args: cd ${workspaceFolder}\fdo_agi_repo; if (Test-Path .venv\Scripts\python.exe) { .venv\Scripts\python.exe -m scripts.run_task --title 'demo' --goal 'AGI ?占쎄린援먯젙 猷⑦봽 ?占쎈챸 3臾몄옣' } else { python -m scripts.run_task --title 'demo' --goal 'AGI ?占쎄린援먯젙 猷⑦봽 ?占쎈챸 3臾몄옣' }

tasks.label: ?占쏙옙 AGI: Assert Second Pass
args: cd ${workspaceFolder}\fdo_agi_repo; if (Test-Path .venv\Scripts\python.exe) { .venv\Scripts\python.exe scripts\assert_second_pass.py } else { python scripts\assert_second_pass.py }

tasks.label: ?占쏙옙 AGI: Summarize Ledger (24h)
args: cd ${workspaceFolder}\fdo_agi_repo; if (Test-Path .venv\Scripts\python.exe) { .venv\Scripts\python.exe scripts\summarize_ledger.py --last-hours 24 } else { python scripts\summarize_ledger.py --last-hours 24 }

tasks.label: ?占쏙옙 AGI: Summarize Ledger (12h)
args: cd ${workspaceFolder}\fdo_agi_repo; if (Test-Path .venv\Scripts\python.exe) { .venv\Scripts\python.exe scripts\summarize_ledger.py --last-hours 12 } else { python scripts\summarize_ledger.py --last-hours 12 }

tasks.label: ?占쏙옙 AGI: Summarize 24h + Health Gate
args: cd ${workspaceFolder}\fdo_agi_repo; if (Test-Path .venv\Scripts\python.exe) { .venv\Scripts\python.exe scripts\summarize_ledger.py --last-hours 24 } else { python scripts\summarize_ledger.py --last-hours 24 }; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { exit $LASTEXITCODE }; & ${workspaceFolder}\fdo_agi_repo\scripts\check_health.ps1

tasks.label: Monitoring: Generate Report (24h) + Open Events CSV
OBS: Scenes: Switch to AI Dev
YouTube: Set Client Secret as Env (user)
Streaming: Start + YouTube Bot

tasks.label: ChatOps: Switch Scene
args: $scene = Read-Host '?λ㈃ ?대쫫???낅젰?섏꽭??(?? AI Dev, Coding, VS Code Stream)'; & '${workspaceFolder}/scripts/chatops_router.ps1' -Say "?λ㈃ $scene 濡?諛붽퓭以?

tasks.label: ?占쏙옙 AGI: Sanitize Resonance Ledger
args: cd ${workspaceFolder}\fdo_agi_repo; if (Test-Path .venv\Scripts\python.exe) { .venv\Scripts\python.exe scripts\sanitize_ledger.py } else { python scripts\sanitize_ledger.py }

tasks.label: Monitor: Stop Background Cache Validator
args: Get-Process -Name 'pwsh','powershell' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object { $_.CommandLine -like '*cache_validation_monitor_daemon.ps1*' } | Stop-Process -Force; Write-Host 'Monitor stopped' -ForegroundColor Green

tasks.label: BQI: Run Feedback Predictor (once)
args: cd ${workspaceFolder}\fdo_agi_repo; if (Test-Path .venv\Scripts\python.exe) { .venv\Scripts\python.exe scripts\rune\feedback_predictor.py } else { python scripts\rune\feedback_predictor.py }

tasks.label: ?占쏙옙 Phase 6: Learn Binoche Persona
args: cd ${workspaceFolder}\fdo_agi_repo; if (Test-Path .venv\Scripts\python.exe) { .venv\Scripts\python.exe scripts\rune\binoche_persona_learner.py } else { python scripts\rune\binoche_persona_learner.py }

tasks.label: ?占쏙옙 BQI: Ensemble Monitor (24h)
args: cd ${workspaceFolder}/fdo_agi_repo; if (Test-Path .venv\Scripts\python.exe) { .venv\Scripts\python.exe scripts\rune\binoche_success_monitor.py --hours 24 } else { python scripts\rune\binoche_success_monitor.py --hours 24 }

tasks.label: ?占쏙옙 BQI: Ensemble Monitor (7 days)
args: cd ${workspaceFolder}/fdo_agi_repo; if (Test-Path .venv\Scripts\python.exe) { .venv\Scripts\python.exe scripts\rune\binoche_success_monitor.py --hours 168 } else { python scripts\rune\binoche_success_monitor.py --hours 168 }

tasks.label: ?占쏙옙 BQI: Run Online Learner (24h)
args: cd ${workspaceFolder}/fdo_agi_repo; if (Test-Path .venv\Scripts\python.exe) { .venv\Scripts\python.exe scripts\rune\binoche_online_learner.py --window-hours 24 --learning-rate 0.01 } else { python scripts\rune\binoche_online_learner.py --window-hours 24 --learning-rate 0.01 }

tasks.label: ?占쏙옙 BQI: Run Online Learner (7 days)
args: cd ${workspaceFolder}/fdo_agi_repo; if (Test-Path .venv\Scripts\python.exe) { .venv\Scripts\python.exe scripts\rune\binoche_online_learner.py --window-hours 168 --learning-rate 0.005 } else { python scripts\rune\binoche_online_learner.py --window-hours 168 --learning-rate 0.005 }

tasks.label: ?占쏙툘 BQI: View Current Weights
args: if (Test-Path '${workspaceFolder}/fdo_agi_repo/outputs/ensemble_weights.json') { Get-Content '${workspaceFolder}/fdo_agi_repo/outputs/ensemble_weights.json' | ConvertFrom-Json | Format-List } else { Write-Host '??No weights file found. Run online learner first.' -ForegroundColor Red }

tasks.label: ?占쏙옙 BQI: View Judge Performance
args: if (Test-Path '${workspaceFolder}/fdo_agi_repo/outputs/online_learning_log.jsonl') { Get-Content '${workspaceFolder}/fdo_agi_repo/outputs/online_learning_log.jsonl' -Tail 1 | ConvertFrom-Json | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10 } else { Write-Host '??No learning log found.' -ForegroundColor Red }

tasks.label: Integration: Run Gitko E2E Test
args: cd ${workspaceFolder}/LLM_Unified/gitko-agent-extension; if (Test-Path ${workspaceFolder}/LLM_Unified/.venv/Scripts/python.exe) { & ${workspaceFolder}/LLM_Unified/.venv/Scripts/python.exe test_integration_simple.py } else { python test_integration_simple.py }

tasks.label: ?占쏙옙 Comet-Gitko: Stop Task Queue Server
args: $jobs = Get-Job | Where-Object { $_.Command -like '*task_queue_server*' }; if ($jobs) { $jobs | ForEach-Object { Stop-Job -Id $_.Id; Remove-Job -Id $_.Id }; Write-Host '??Task queue server stopped' -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host '?占쏙툘 No running task queue server found' -ForegroundColor Yellow }

tasks.label: ?占쏙옙 Comet-Gitko: Check Server Status
args: try { $response = Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'http://localhost:8091/api/health' -TimeoutSec 2; Write-Host '??Task Queue Server is ONLINE' -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host "Response: $($response.Content)" -ForegroundColor Cyan } catch { Write-Host '??Task Queue Server is OFFLINE' -ForegroundColor Red; Write-Host '   Start it with: Comet-Gitko: Start Task Queue Server' -ForegroundColor Yellow }

tasks.label: AGI: Auto Resume on Workspace Open
RPA: Start Worker (Background Job)
args: cd ${workspaceFolder}\fdo_agi_repo; Start-Job -ScriptBlock { Set-Location '${workspaceFolder}\fdo_agi_repo'; if (Test-Path .venv\Scripts\python.exe) { .venv\Scripts\python.exe integrations\rpa_worker.py --server 'http://127.0.0.1:8091' --interval 0.3 --log-level INFO } else { python integrations\rpa_worker.py --server 'http://127.0.0.1:8091' --interval 0.3 --log-level INFO } } -Name 'RPA_Worker' | Format-List Id,Name,State; Write-Host 'RPA Worker started in background (Job: RPA_Worker)' -ForegroundColor Green

tasks.label: Watchdog: Stop Task Watchdog
args: Get-Process -Name 'pwsh','powershell' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object { $_.CommandLine -like '*task_watchdog.py*' } | Stop-Process -Force; Write-Host 'Watchdog stopped' -ForegroundColor Green

tasks.label: Realtime: Open Latest Summary (MD)
args: if (Test-Path '${workspaceFolder}/outputs/realtime_pipeline_summary_latest.md') { code ${workspaceFolder}/outputs/realtime_pipeline_summary_latest.md } else { Write-Host 'No summary found. Run: Realtime: Summarize + Open' -ForegroundColor Yellow }

tasks.label: Realtime: Open Latest Summary (JSON)
args: if (Test-Path '${workspaceFolder}/outputs/realtime_pipeline_summary_latest.json') { code ${workspaceFolder}/outputs/realtime_pipeline_summary_latest.json } else { Write-Host 'No summary JSON found. Run: Realtime: Summarize (24h|spark60) + Open' -ForegroundColor Yellow }

tasks.label: ?뱷 Session: Show Recent Context
args: Get-ChildItem '${workspaceFolder}/outputs/session_memory' -Recurse -File | Sort-Object LastWriteTime -Descending | Select-Object -First 10 | Format-Table Name, Length, LastWriteTime

tasks.label: Original Data: Open Index (JSON)
args: if (Test-Path '${workspaceFolder}/outputs/original_data_index.json') { code ${workspaceFolder}/outputs/original_data_index.json } else { Write-Host 'No original_data_index.json found. Run: Original Data: Build Index (open)' -ForegroundColor Yellow }

taskDefinitions.label: ?벀 Handover: Create Manual
args: $task = Read-Host 'Task description'; $progress = Read-Host 'Current progress'; $next = Read-Host 'Next steps (comma-separated)'; python '${workspaceFolder}/session_memory/session_handover.py' create --task "$task" --progress "$progress" --next $next.Split(',')

taskDefinitions.label: ?렞 Context: Full Restore Chain
args: Write-Host 'Context Restore Chain Started' -ForegroundColor Cyan; & '${workspaceFolder}/scripts/show_context_state.ps1'; Write-Host ''; & '${workspaceFolder}/scripts/auto_resume_on_startup.ps1'; Write-Host ''; python '${workspaceFolder}/session_memory/session_handover.py' load
